Description:
Serene Lifestyle, Room for the Family, Horse & Boat.
(218297) Located at the top end of a quiet court, tucked away and surrounded by other premium lifestyle properties is this great 1.58acres approx. property in the well sought after heights of The Gurdies.
This property has been exceptionally setup utilising every inch accordingly, giving it a much larger feel. Offering a lovely family home, great paddock arrangement and a good sized workshop, this is certainly not one to go past.
- 3 bedroom family home with timber floors & high ceilings.
- Master with full ensuite & WIR.
- Bedrooms 2 & 3 with BIR's.
- Wrap around veranda & larger carport/entertaining area.
- Fenced to 3 paddocks, all with hot wire.
- Barn with power, workshop bay & 2 lockup stables.
With so much on offer and with genuine sellers, an inspection is a must to truly experience what this property has to offer.
For all enquiries & inspections please Call Jason Brown Direct.

Description:
ATTENTION INVESTORS!
This hot property located on a large 2066sqm approx. corner allotment is on the market ready for someone prepared to put the love back into it! Positioned in a peaceful country town, across the road from the local park, community centre and only a short walk to the General Store and Bass Pub.
This brick veneer home has period charm and old world living, whilst also having updates throughout. Three good sized bedrooms, updated main bathroom and master ensuite, along with two living areas, updated kitchen with ranch style stove, wood heating and an expansive under cover deck to the rear.
This property won't last long, it requires some work to the veneer, finishing off to some of the updated fixtures and other than that, it will make for the perfect country retreat most home owners are looking for. Having almost direct access onto the highway mean less travel time to the nearing main towns of Wonthaggi, San Remo, Phillip Island and also a clear run into the city.
The opportunity to further subdivide this block is apparent for the savvy investor (STCA).
Don't miss out on this fantastic opportunity to secure your next investment. Please contact the friendly team at Alex Scott & Staff Bass Valley today to arrange your inspection!

A unique opportunity presents itself here, be quick to call!

Address: Lot 33 Langley Boulevard Lang Lang VIC 3984
Description:
Ready Set Go!
Why wait to build, when this sparkling new home is ready for you to move straight into.
Fully serviced titled block including natural gas, power, sewage and telephone in a new development with open spaces and playground areas.
The home is under construction and features 4 good sized bedrooms, 3 of the bedrooms have built in robes, with the Master also featuring a full en suite. Formal living room, generous sized open plan meals, family room adjourning a fully functioning kitchen with stainless appliances and a generous sized walk in pantry, plus a double garage under the roof line.
This package includes bonus inclusions list offering you many more extras. Please contact us for more details.
The Langley Park Estate is developing into a desirable country lifestyle, offering a choice of schools, medical facilities and only a 30 minute drive to major shopping centers and coastal resorts.

Description:
THE BEACH SHACK
Situated 20 meters from the foreshore on a corner block is this quirky beach house.
Entering via the lock up carport, you are greeted with feature windows and a beach house colour scheme. Wood heater on entry ads some charm, as does the light filled lounge room with two full walls of windows. An updated kitchen with stainless steel appliances, plenty of bench space and storage with adjoining meals area. The home features new carpet, fresh paint throughout, two large bedrooms (one with BIRs) and a third smaller bedroom. Main bathroom has the shower over the bath and a separate toilet.
Externally the property has much to offer with a lock up garage, lock up carport, established garden, private decking and garden shed.
Contact the friendly team at Alex Scott & Staff Bass Valley today to arrange your inspection!

Description:
19 BURCHELL CLOSE
Are you ready to design and build your new home on this 683sqm block approx, in a private and peaceful location, situated in a quaint no through road in an exclusive part of Corinella.
Only a short walk to the Corinella Beach and Walking Tracks, close to the 24 hour boat jetty, General Store Post Office, close to the Community Centre, Bowls Club, Tennis Courts. You will also be surrounded by all the Bass Coast tourist attractions, Vine Yards, Local Markets, San Remo, Churchill Island Heritage Farm - Philip Island and a lot more.
If you are seeking that peaceful coastal getaway feel, then this block is for you.
If you would like some more information call Tamara or Daniel on 03 5678 0219

2 Storey Beach Home - Sensational Position - Requires TLC

This 3 bedroom home offers tremendous open plan living & heaps of potential but it will require some work on your behalf. There is a balcony deck area at the front and the home is surrounded by lovely gardens and is fully fenced. The home does require repairs to bring it back to its former glory. Call to book an inspection!

Description:
Court Position
This beautiful home with many extras, most of the rooms have just been re-painted inside & out. Pattern paved driveway, side access to backyard. 50’ x 25’ shed complete with power connected, concrete floor and extra power points. Under cover huge pergola the length of the house. Roof has been restored and repainted.
Spacious 3 bedroom home and 2 living areas. A feature brick wall and bay window in lounge. Timber kitchen, dishwasher, double pantry, electric wall oven and 5 burner gas stove top. Ducted heating throughout and a wall air conditioner. Master with ensuite, his & hers wardrobes. 2nd & 3rd bedrooms also with built in wardrobes.
A front picket fence completes this home with neat gardens on approx. 1159m2 block.

Description:
175 Pastured Acres (approx.) with Sealed Road Frontage and Mains Water
At almost 175 Acres of cleared pastures this is a prime land holding with all the versatility that a level block offers for your choice of stock or equestrian. Securely fenced to 5 paddocks with the convenience of reticulated mains water, the property is currently set up for cattle grazing.A bounty of shedding includes a 20mx20m machinery/storage shed (also incorporating three stables), 14mx10m three bay hayshed, 14mx6m workshop and various other useful sundry shedding. There are also excellent stock handling facilities including load race. An older style unrenovated, 3 bedroom brick residence offers scope to hone your renovation skills.Fronting a sealed road and with access to the South Gippsland Highway literally on the doorstep this is a very conveniently located property. Primed for major shopping and business hubs at Pakenham, Cranbourne and on to Melbourne, leisure at Phillip Island, local attractions and convenience at Koo Wee Rup and the booming expansion of Lang Lang. The tenets of position, location and amenity make this boutique holding the perfect property for work, rest, play and opportunity!

Description:
Fantastic family living on huge 720sqm block
Nestled in peaceful surroundings situates this outstanding 1 year old family home that exudes light, style and has plenty of space sprawling over a generous 26 squares approx. All of the family will love the modern conveniences, excellent location and generous block size that this gorgeous home has to offer.
- Theatre room with full cinematic experience complete with projector, projector screen and platform with cinema style seating
- Fully landscaped low maintenance gardens with feature alfresco
- DLUG with internal access plus side access to rear – perfect for a boat, caravan or trailer
Further complimenting the home is the ideal location, being within walking distance to all the amenities and facilities the village has to offer including shops, brewery, Lang Lang Primary School, public transport, with easy access to Western Port Hwy and other major road arterials.

Description:
AFFORDABLE COASTAL PROPERTY
Immaculate presented split-level home within walking distance to water. Light and bright throughout and featuring upstairs 2 good size bedrooms, modern spacious bathroom with full bath, open plan living /kitchen and meals area. The kitchen has modern stainless steel appliances as new condition, modern floor coverings throughout, electric heating and portable cooling. There is access to balcony from living area which offers some glimpses of bay.
Downstairs is a large guest bedroom/ teenagers getaway, modern 2nd bathroom with frameless shower, laundry and good storage area. The block offers plenty of room for caravan and boat plus extra vehicles. There is two carports, garden shed/utility room, 2 small water tanks, stoned driveway and the property is completely fenced with double gates which gives great privacy. Walk to the bus stop only metres away offering great commute to Dandenong and schools. Visit the local wineries or take the dog for walks through the Gurdies State Forrest across the road. A group of shops including bank, chemist, newsagency, permanent doctor , ambulance depot and cafes are only minutes away. Phillip Island and major shopping centre approx. 25 mins and easy commute to CBD with dual lane highway.
Disclaimer - We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable. However, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective purchasers are advised to carry out their own investigations. www.1stre.com.au

Description:
Spacious Stylish Townhouse
Your chance to own your own home and give up renting. On offer is this 2 Bedroom townhouse, large open plan living, Kitchen/Meals/Family Living. Kitchen with island bench, dishwasher, 900 hotplate & oven. A full turn key package, you just need to buy the furniture and move in! Complete with blinds, carpets, tiles and remote single garage. 3 Units on the block. Only minutes from the local shops. Centrally located. Ring today to enquire!

Description:
SERENADED AT SUNSET
Such a delight it is to present this lovely light filled and charming home which has plenty to offer including water views, uninterrupted sunsets and the unique position opposite the foreshore.
Entering through timber French doors to a downstairs open plan lounge/living room, you are able to imagine sitting in front of the wood heater, overlooking the private garden or looking out to the tree lined foreshore beyond. Downstairs also offers two large light filled bedrooms with built in robes, and a well equipped main bathroom with European laundry facilities to complete the space.
Let the stress of the day slip away as you make your way upstairs to the expansive open plan living area. Offering space for a lounge, dining area and study. A large entertainer's kitchen is well equipped with stainless steel appliances, gas cooktop, plenty of storage and bench space. Enjoying a beautiful outlook from this space to the sunsets on the horizon and the tree lined foreshore. The master bedroom is also upstairs and includes built in robes and a lovely ensuite, with North facing windows looking out over Pioneer Bay.
A home with so many features including new privacy blinds throughout, polished timber floors, pattern paved concrete driveway, shed/studio to the rear, carport (tall enough for a boat), two side gardens, water tank, fruit trees and vegetable patch.
In today's market this unique property won't last long.
Please contact the team at Alex Scott & Staff - Bass Valley today to arrange your inspection.

Description:
80 METRES TO FORESHORE!!
If you are in the market to purchase a building block in Coronet Bay you would realise that there are not many that come on the market. This block is affordable and ideally located within walking distance to a safe sandy swimming beach, playground and shop. Coronet Bay is a popular beach for families and people come from all around to enjoy the atmosphere on New Years Eve and fireworks. Bring the boat as there is a 24 hour boat ramp only a few minutes away.
Local group of shops which include doctor , chemist, bank and cafes are 7 minutes away and major shopping centre and Phillip Island approx. 25 mins. Easy commute to CBD with dual lane highway.
This land can also be viewed on www.yourlandshop.com.au

Address: Lot 100 Alloway St, Langley Estate - Stage 4 Lang Lang VIC 3984
Description:
A New Block - Stage 4 Langley Park Estate
A large fully serviced residential block in a newly released subdivision in the township of Lang Lang. Titles are expected approx February 2019.
Services include, town water, sewerage, natural gas & underground power.
Lang Lang offers an opportunity to live the country lifestyle, with great schools, medical facilities and a comfortable drive to beaches and many tourist destinations.

Description:
4 BEDROOM TOWNHOUSE - GOOD AS NEW.
We are proud to present this beautiful well designed home.
A surprisingly spacious and functional layout including a large RC garage and fully enclosed lockup yard will appeal to young families, ideal for retirees or weekenders offering privacy in a quiet court. This low maintenance rendered home is under 2 years old and is in "as new" condition throughout.
- 4 good sized bedrooms, carpets, BIRs, master with ensuite and WIR,
- generous living areas with a lounge and separate family room,
- open plan kitchen dining area, tiled floor including entrance, 900mm appliances,
- RC air conditioning in lounge and master bedroom.
- Large c/bond double garage, RC door, direct pedestrian access,
For further information please contact Ray Cullen on 0429 977 313

Description:
Tranquil family living
Nestled in the quiet yet amenity filled township of Lang Lang situates this gorgeous family home that oozes light and character throughout. Boasting a large allotment with plenty of yard space for all the family to appreciate.
- Updated kitchen with quality finishes & appliances
- Huge 9x5m undercover alfresco decked out in Merbau which comes complete with Coonara wood fire heater & TV included
- Quiet location with generous block size
- Additional features include ducted heating, split system, tinted windows, solar panels, large side access driveway. Plus bonus massive 13x8m machinery shed with fully sealed concrete floor, 15amp + 3 phase available, double roller door with 4.3m clearance & extra rear roller door with laneway access
Ideally located within walking distance to all amenities the village has to offer including shops, brewery, Lang Lang Primary School, public transport, Western Port Hwy and major road arterials.
